case_title: United States of America v. Gray
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Gray

charges.charge_description: 18:1153 and 113(a)(3) CIR - Assault With a Dangerous Weapon(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Custody of BOP for term of FORTY ONE (41) MOS followed by supervised release for term of THREE (3) YRS; S/A: $100; Restitution $150.00 6/22/04 REVOKING supervised release. Dft committed to BOP for term of ELEVEN (11) MOS followed by supervi sed release for term of TWENTY FIVE (25) MOS - SUPERVISED RELEASE REVOKED ON 4/19/2017 - Defendant committed to the Bureau of Prisons for FIVE (5) MONTHS. No further period of supervised release imposed.

charges.charge_description: 18:1153 and 113(a)(6) CIR - Assault Resulting In Serious Bodily Injury(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on government's oral motion at sentencing
